fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Fortified: The first time you empty your hand, draw 5 cards at the end of the phase.
- Mobilization: If you played at least 3 cards this phase, your hand size will temporarily increase to 6 the following phase.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Reconstitute: Pick two cards in your hand. Discard them and draw 2 cards. [Infinite uses, 2 CD]
- Build: Reforge a card. [2 uses, 2 CD]
- Supplies: Duplicate 3 random cards in your hand, excluding modifiers. [1 use, Unique]
